items.name: Check Door
items.description: Verify door is closed, alert if open

items.name: Count Door
items.description: Count the number of doors in the room by scanning with camera and moving around

items.name: Count People in Room
items.description: Count people in room by rotating and scanning with camera

items.name: Wave Hello
items.description: Friendly wave gesture when a person is detected

items.name: Gripper Open Close
items.description: Open and close the gripper on command

items.name: Arm Reach Point
items.description: Move arm end-effector to a specified (x,y,z) point in space

items.name: Tap Surface
items.description: Lower arm to gently tap a surface below

items.name: Arm Sweep
items.description: Sweep arm across a horizontal arc
